article.description: Utah overcame its worst shooting performance of the season to win yet again in the first round.
article.headline: Majerus, Utah continue first-round magic
article.linkText: Utah can't shoot straight, still surprises Oregon
article.story: EUGENE, Ore. (AP) -- Andre Joseph scored 20 points and Luke Jackson added 18 points and 10 rebounds to lift Oregon to a 96-76 exhibition win over MBC Nikolaev on Sunday. Ian Crosswhite, Aaron Brooks and James Davis also reached double figures as the Ducks shot 54 percent. Oregon dominated the boards, grabbing a 15-4 edge on the offensive glass. Oleksandr Rayevskyy had 25 points and six assists to lead the touring team from the Ukraine. ^
